metadata.name: The sunset of hope
metadata.description:
This masterpiece and stunning artwork is a very valuable and amazing Iranian miniature painting drawn using acrylic technique.
It shows the real story of the life of Hazrat Abul Fazl, peace be upon him. When the enemy blocked the access to the water in a war,  he attacks to the enemy to bring some water for children. But when he reaches the river, he does not drink water, remembering the thirsty children in the carvan with them. And he takes some water from the river with him in a water skin.
On the way, the enemy soldiers cut off his two hands so that he could not carry water with him and he martyred with thirsty mouth.

This stunning art work is special and unique in the world and has no similar example.
After buying the digital version of this artwork, the original of it which is in the form of painting, will be sent to the buyer's postal address for free.
